import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); const PlaceOrderHandler = () => { console.log('object'); }; return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ${cart.ShippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ); }; export default PlaceOrderScreen;
